flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This is a project in which you can flash a number of LED's using a TIP31 transistor.Its very attractive and cool to watch this.So come on.Lets make it!
guide.introduction_rendered: This is a project in which you can flash a number of LED's using a TIP31 transistor.Its very attractive and cool to watch this.So come on.Lets make it!

guide.title: FLASHING LED'S WITH MUSIC
